title: Thoughtful, focused & reliable AI
text: SystEin is a one-person AI studio focused on building a few high-quality agents instead of many shallow ones. Everything is designed to be fast, privacy-aware, and easy to integrate into your existing workflows.

section.title: Why SystEin?
section.content: You get direct access to the engineer building your solution. No layers of sales or buzzwords—just clear requirements, transparent design choices, and AI that actually fits your context.

section.title: Why Coach Irene?
section.content: Coach Irene is designed for people with ADHD traits who need structure without pressure. It helps with planning, breaking tasks into smaller steps, and checking in—always as a coach, never as a medical professional.
